Articles.Content:
So I'm trying to figure how to make protective shell bases a) thinner (Dear god they're obscenely fat in some cases) and have an integrated separator at the top to eject the next stage, because... that only makes sense... and c) use modulemanager to do this.

It's been a LONG time since I poked around at all, though. Where would I look for advice or tutorials on those three parts?
